modName: English translation of Sexy Vanilla Clothes and Armors for Sevenbase Bombshell
summary: Original mod is in German and this is the English translation for users of Sexy Vanilla Clothes and Armors for Sevenbase Bombshell
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]This mod is only left here for archive purposes, the latest English translations are now uploaded directly to the main mod.[/size][/b]



The author of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47477]Sexy Vanilla Clothes and Armors for Sevenbase Bombshell [/url]is making his mod in the German language and doesn't yet want to make a English translation for it. Here is my translation of his mod, into English and I'll also be cleaning his mod in Tes5Edit and I'll try to fix any errors I find in his .esp file.

I'll probably miss some of his dirty edits, as I have to find some of them manually, due to the mod being in German and that my game is in English, but I'll clean it as best as I can and I'll also be merging footstep sound fixes from the Unofficial Skyrim patch (USKP)

[size=4][b][u]Cleaned and or translated PfiffysArmorAddon:[/u][/b][/size]
[b][u]Changes in 1.6[/u][u]RC:[/u][/b] Seeing as I'm working with Pfiffy I'm not actually performing cleanup outside of the files he releases, but here are some things that have been introduced in 1.6RC.
1stPersonMeshes have been added or corrected for almost every armor changed by PfiffysArmorAddon
Outfits have been modifed to increase variaty in what NPCs wear, though a side effect of this NPC may become naked if they spawned before this mod was activated, so new game is recommended.

A workaround if you have naked NPC and not using a new game is to just add a armor/clothes piece to the npc and equip it using console. Start by opening the console and clicking the NPC to select them and if you want to inspect their inventory type "Showinventory", you can use this to figure out what would be the most fitting for them. After you've decided what they should wear type something like this:
[code]help merchant
.additem 0004223C 1
.equipitem 0004223C[/code]
the number 0004223C is the form ID of merchant clothes which the console will show you if you type help merchant (assuming you use the English esp).


[b][u]Installation:[/u][/b]
Use your favorite mod manager and let this mod overwrite the file "PfiffysArmorAddon.esp" from the original mod by Pfiffy
I like to use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/url] for my mod managing needs.
Manual: unzip using 7-zip and overwrite the file "PfiffysArmorAddon.esp" in your skyrim\data directory

credits: Pfiffy for obvious reasons.
Also all the authors that Pfiffy uses assets from.


[size=4][b][u]No More Commando (optional extra thing) DO not use with Pfiffy 1.6:[/u][/b][/size]
[i]Please observe that this is not in a state where it should be used with PfiffysArmorAddon 1.6 due to differences in outfit entries.[/i]
Ever thought it was strange that every woman in skyrim always went commando i.e. without panties. Well today this changes, now everyone will carry some panties with them, even perverted men, just in case they meet a woman in need of some fresh panties.

I've added a file in the misc section of downloads called "no more commando", which simply adds panties to almost all outfit lists in skyrim, meaning that women will be using underwear. This means no more upskirt peeking and at least some aspect of decency is left after looting armor or clothes of a dead female NPC.

I've also edited armors from pfiffysarmoraddon.esp file and from the vanilla game to hide the underwear when the actual clothes/armor already has built in panties and this is also done for some of the more severe cases of the panties clipping through. This means the added underwear will rarely clip through what you wear over them.

A few exceptions to note: The underwer doesn't clip on, but can look strange on the ragged robes, forsworn armor and the dragonbone armor and I could remove panties from the outfit lists that provide these armors. Any thoughts on this?
Roughspun Tunic had a bit much clipping and as such when wearing them, the underwear won't be visible

Also If you see any armor/clothes with cover for the nether regions, but the panties still show up, tell me in the comments and I'll fix it

[b][u]Notes for the latest versions of NoMoreCommando:[/u][/b]
[b]1.5.1[/b] I only merged the outfit entries with pfiffy's armoraddon, so there may be some armors where the panties need to be hidden.

[b][u]NoMoreCommando Requires:[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34308/?]Sevenbase version of Kuzzak's lingerie set[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?]UNP undies[/url] There exists a 7B version of this, but not on the nexus, so google that if you must have a 7B version
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47477/?]Pfiffys armor replacer[/url] Version 1.2, compatible with both English and German version
Any requirement that the above mdos have.
[b][u]NoMoreCommando Conflicts:[/u][/b]
Any mod that changes the outfit lists or modifies the same armor addons as I do. The conflicts shouldn't cause any problem, at the most you'll have NPC, which don't get the underwear or underwear showing up on armor/clothes on which it shouldn't.
The only mod I know of off hand that changes outfit lists is OBIS, but that is only about 4 entries of a few hundred.
Immersive wenches adds two outfit entries of its own so some of the added wenches will get underwear and some won't.
Otherwise this should work with just about anything.



P.S Na ga Nai Mono, simply means: "He without name"
author: Na ga Nai Mono

files.name: PfiffysArmorAddon_GER_FIXES 1.3
files.changelogHtml:
Removed Weapon entries
Removed added shield on OutfitListGuardWhiterunNoHelmet
Added shield on OutfitListGuardWinterhold to conform with USKP
Made OutfitListGuardWhiterunNormalHelmet use Whiterun cuirass instead of Winterhold
Footstep sounds on many armors fixed in the same way as USKP did
Changed feamle priority of farm02VariantAA to 5, to conform wiht USKP
Changed feamle priority of FineClothesVariant01AA to 5, to conform wiht USKP
EbonyMail boots use heavy footstep
GuardStormCloakBootsAA use light footstep
GuardImperialBootsAA use light footstep
DawnguardBoots[u]Haevy[/u]AA use Heavy footstep
Added the keyword: "PerkFistsSteelPlate" to Blades Gauntlet
Changed keyword on falmer helmet to use armor heavy instead of armor light
Shrouded Cowl Maskless "Schattenhelm Offen" use the maskless world model
Shrouded Cowl "Chattenhelm" use the masked world model
Added light armor keyword to ClothesJarlGloves02
Added ClothingRich keyword to ShegorathBoots
Removed the Keywords: VendorItemClothing, ClothingBody and ClothingPoor from:
Forswornboots, ForswornCuirass, ForswornHelmet and ForswornGauntlets
Added the keyword ClothingRich to Party boots "Festliche Schue"
Removed descriptipn and "MagicDissallowEnchanting" keyword from Both Dawnguard helmets, as it isn't actually enchanted
Dawnguard Heavy Gauntlets Changed the perkfiststelplate keyword to PerFistsDwarven to match how USKP fixed this
Switched names between "Dunmerkleidung Blau" and "Dunmerkleidung Blau Kapuze"

files.name: PfiffysArmorAddon_GER_fixes_1.3.1.esp
files.changelogHtml:
The following changes were made to improve compatibility with Guard Dialogue Overhaul
removed Daedric armor
Studded armor (pfiffy only removed the ArmorMaterialStudded keyword)
SteelCuirassB Stahlrüstung Alt conflicts with Guard Dialogue Overhaul, but this is acceptable so no change made to this entry

Merged some more records with USKP:
FalmerHelm merged a few changes
Merged with UKSP, this means adding two armoraddons for beast races
GeneralTulliusArmor, removed the VendorItemClothing keyword
ClothesPsiijicHood added kahjit armoraddon to match USKP
ClothesJarlGloves02 added object bounds from USKP
ClothesPrisonerRags added object bounds and the ClothingPoor keyword to match USKP
ClothesCollegeHood added armoraddon for Orc to match USKP
All Penitus-Oculatus armors removed the ArmorMaterialImperialLight keyword to match USKP
ArmorPenitusHelm added circlet to the Biped Body Template to match USKP
DBArmorHelmetSP added armoraddon for argonian and khajit to match USKP
ClothesJarlGloves added object bounds from USKP
DBArmorHelmetWOrn added armoraddon for khajit&argonian to match USKP
ClothesMonkRobesHooded added armoraddon for khajit to match USKP
ClothesCollegeHoodVariant1 Changed armoraddon to use same as USKP
ClothesCollegeHoodVariant2 Changed armoraddon to use same as USKP
ClothesCollegeBootsCommonVariant1 made keywords match USKP and changed weight/value to match USKP
ClothesCollegeBootsApprenticeVariant1 made keywords match USKP and changed weight/value to match USKP
DBArmorHelmetWornPlayable Added object bounds from USKP and wanted to add some armoraddons from USKP, but don't think it'll match if I do that
DBArmorGlovesWornPlayable Removed description, as there is no enchant or script attached


Removed ArmorElvenLightCuirass as no meaningful change was made by pfiffy and USKP changes the female world model

files.name: PfiffysArmorAddon_GER_V1.4
files.changelogHtml:
MS06ShieldL12 changed bash and block material to match USKP
DBArmorHelmetWOrn added armoraddon for khajit&argonian to match USKP
Removed LItemVigilantHeavyBoots entry as it is a dirty edit
Changed ArmorStormcloakBear to be crafted in tanning rack and changed the material keyword to leather
Modifed recipe for stormcloak sleeved to be an upgrade of normal stormcloak cuirass

files.name: PfiffysArmorAddon_English_1.5
files.changelogHtml:
DBarmorWorn double space in name i.e "Schattenrüstung Getragen"
Fußlappen renamed to Fusslappen
ArmorEbonyMailLightCuirass renamed Ebenzerharnisch Leicht -> Ebenerzkettenharnisch Leicht
Made the guards shields into light armor, matches the stats better that way
Removed the MS06ShieldL12 entry
Daedric armor used a first person model as main model, result: only arms were visible and body disappeared. Fixed this

Additional changes made to English version:
Translated all entries, notable things done since 1.4.1 is that the Guard's armors no longer mimics vanilla skyrim and now puts the hold last to group all the guard's armor variants together. I've changed the naming of some of the thievs guild armors so that the Guild Master armor and other variants all start with "Thievs Guild" in the name. Lastly I've changed the "Worn Shrouded..." and "Ancient Shrouded..." to all start with Shrouded e.g. "Shrouded Ancient Armor"

files.name: No More Commando 1.5.1
files.changelogHtml:
DaedricCuirassAA fixed models and enabled the weight slider (may cause gaps at hands but it will not be one size fits all)
DBarmorWorn double space in name i.e "Schattenrüstung Getragen"
Fußlappen renamed to Fusslappen
ArmorEbonyMailLightCuirass renamed Ebenzerharnisch Leicht -> Ebenerzkettenharnisch Leicht
Made the guard's shields into light armor, matches the stats better that way
LootCWImperialsChestBossBase added LootCWImperialsScrolls100 to Match USKP
LootCWSonsChestBossBase added LootCWSonsScrolls100 to match USKP
LootForswornChestBossBase added LootForswornScrolls100 to match USKP
TreasFalmerChestBoss added the flag "Allow Sounds When Animation" to match USKP
ClothesJarlGloves removed the female ground model to match USKP
Alte Nordpanzerhandschuhe changed fist perk to PerkFistsSteel and copied object bounds from USKP
Alte Nordrüstung renamed to Alte Nordharnisch
ArmorElvenGildedCuirass changed wordl ground model to match USKP
ArmorElvenLightCuirass changed female ground model to match USKP
ArmorEbonyLightGauntlets Is now light armor and removed fist perk
ArmorEbonyMailLightGauntlets removed fist perk
ArmorElvenGildedShield now uses WPNBashShiedlLIghtImpaceSet and MaterialShieldLight
ArmorDaedricGauntletsLight removed fist perk
ClothesUlfricGauntlets ground model uses ulfric texture
BriarHeartAA increased priority to 3 for male and 5 for female.
DLC2ChitinLightCuirassMTAA added alternate texture for male first person model to match USKP
DLC2ChitinLightGauntletsMTAA added alternate texture for male first person model to match USKP
ImperialCuirassLightAA weapon adjust set to 0.3 to match USKP
ImperialCuirassMediumAA weapon adjust set to 0.3 to match USKP
WeddingDressTorso01AA added alternate texture for male first person model to match USKP
BladesCuirassAA added amulet to biped to hide amulets when worn
ElvenCuirassAA added amulet to biped to hide amulets when worn
ElvenCuirassLightAA added amulet to biped to hide amulets when worn
